text: Bruno Ngotty (born 10 June 1971) is a French former professional footballer. He played as a centre-back from 1988 until 2008, however he came out of retirement briefly in 2011. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League National Cup National Cup League Cup League Cup Other Other Total Total Club Season Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Lyon 1988–89 Division 2 30 1 0 0 30 1 Lyon 1989–90 Division 1 27 0 0 0 27 0 Lyon 1990–91 Division 1 37 2 0 0 37 2 Lyon 1991–92 Division 1 36 1 3 0 39 1 Lyon 1992–93 Division 1 36 3 0 0 36 3 Lyon 1993–94 Division 1 36 3 0 0 36 3 Lyon 1994–95 Division 1 35 3 1 0 0 0 36 3 Lyon Total Total 237 13 1 0 3 0 241 13 Paris Saint-Germain 1995–96 Division 1 24 1 0 0 7 1 31 2 Paris Saint-Germain 1996–97 Division 1 30 4 1 0 9 0 39 4 Paris Saint-Germain 1997–98 Division 1 26 2 2 0 6 1 34 3 Paris Saint-Germain Total Total 80 7 3 0 21 2 104 9 A.C.
